Without any bother, we were given a larger room on 15th floor. Check-in was swift, staff very helpful. We opted for half board, breakfast is very good with a good selection of hot & cold items and eggs made to order. Fresh juices served for breakfast too. Staff were very welcoming and friendly. Dinner is to a very good standard. Maybe not has big of a selection as other hotels I've been to but there was always something the kids could eat. Despite it being off peak, food was plentiful. Very well located with good parking facilities. Rooms cleaned very well on a daily. Despite it being a business hotel, we…

The hotel has a perfect location close to the beach in the center of Tanger. Interesting places as the souks are quite close. The rooms are modern and the service is of high level. Breakfast and also the restaurant is prefect.

I like the location. A shopping mall with supermarket and food court is only a few metres away. The beach is very close. The rooms are modern and clean with a very nice big bathroom. The breakfast is very good and it's served in a very nice restaurant with sea view. My highlight is the very friendly and helpful stuff!!

This hotel is very close to the promenade, and handy for restaurants. The bar area is very comfortable. Rooms are well equipped and modern, and there is on site parking garage which is unusual in Tanger. Breakfast is very good with a great selection.

column3: Nice Hilton, good location, very friendly staff.
column4: Just here for an overnight stay. On arrival the booking in was fast and painless. The staff were very good. I don't speak Arabic or French but there English was perfect. The room is what you would expect from a good Hilton. Good space, clean and practical. If I was to find an issue it was that the TV Channels would not work and there was no regular tea options as sachets.

We stayed a single night at the Hilton Garden Inn. I found the staff to be friendly and helpful. The room was clean. The hotel was a quiet retreat from busy Tangier. Only problem was the restaurant. The service was super slow, food bland, and way overpriced in comparison to the rest of the city. We made the mistake after the long transatlantic journey to just eat there. My advice would be to skip the restaurant but enjoy the rest of this nice hotel.

We spent a few days over Christmas in Tangier had had the best hotel stay I have experienced in quite a while here. I have stayed in a few Hilton’s over the past 12 months and despite garden inn being the supposed cheaper end of the hotel brand, you certainly wouldn’t know it from staying here. From the moment we checked in the service from Besma was impeccable, very professional, efficient but friendly and made us feel very welcome. The rooms (we had 2 a twin and a family room, 1115 and 1109) are of a great standard, clean comfortable and well decorated, and despite there being 2 adults & 2 kids I. The family room, was still enough room to move around. obviously the hotel is still quite new current standard is to be expected, and hopefully this is maintained. The…

Staff at the restaurant must learn English or at least French They can’t understand the difference between fork and knife We pay a lot of money for the 1st year’s eve buffet and we had to wait in a huge line for an hour on a cold place, without water. Awful

Great location, good food, clean and comfortable rooms, amazing staff, who was able to remember our names on the next morning and our coffee preferences. I would definitely recommend this hotel and stay there again on my next trip to Tangier. Next door to a shopping mall, just in case you need extra snacks, a SIM card, or pretty much anything else.

column3: You will enjoy your stay here!
column4: The Hilton Garden Inn Tanger is an attractive new hotel with a terrific breakfast buffet, well equipped fitness room, and superb staff. It is a stone's throw from the train station, next to a shopping mall, and right by the beach. You can walk to the medina (if you are a walker) or go by taxi.

The bartender was amazing! Very helpful and kind woman who’s name was Rajae! You should ask for her assistance when you come to this hotel! The hotel was very clean and the hotel bar/ lounge was very clean and had a great ambiance.

column3: Normal Inn style hotel with good breakfast
column4: I joined my parents to travel in Morocco. The hotel in Tanger offered very good buffet breakfast. It’s style is Clean and organized. The service staff are friendly. The room is very small. Normal impression as a Hilton Inn. Thanks!

I have got the chance to stay in different Hilton hotels, which is a brand that I love and appreciate for the service and high standard. This Garden Inn has a lot to offer, because the staff is seriously the best one I have ever met. Generally Garden Inn is one of the basic brand in the Hilton Worldwide family, but I ensure you that Garden Inn Tanger City Center is a 5 star hotel. The service is impeccable in every aspect, and the team is always welcoming and happy to help you. They always want to make everything right for the guest, and I really appreciate that. I have been in more luxurious places, but no one has been so kind and caring as the guys from Front Desk, F&B, and House Keeping in this hotel. The room was big and bright, housekeeping has always done a great job,…

Best Service, from. The front desk to the housekeeping to the breakfast restaurant. I love the team of staff. They are so cheerful, helpful and the best hospitality I received so far across the hilton chain group, even better than Conrad Singapore, or Conrad Bangkok. Location is next to mall, many options to eat. Short walk to the beach. Only downside is the relatively slow and unstable internet but I think that can easily be resolved. Thanks you! Soukran!

Amazing hotel, the rooms are comfy with a great vue on the city. The food was also incredible. The staff was cheerful, polite and helpful, and gave us a great welcoming, especially Abdelilah from the housekeeping, been of a great help. Beautiful decoration with modern art all over the property. Keeping a good memory of it. #ThankYouAbelilah#housekeeping

column3: 2 relaxing nights at Hilton Garden Inn
column4: Great hotel as usual with excellent front desk clerks, great location, clean rooms and comfortable beds. Unlike my first time in Hilton, this time I tried the food service and let me tell you that I haven't regretted it.

Excellent Hotel and the greatest Management and staff you could want, they made my 2 months stay feel like home and the rooms are a good size the food great. I will stay with them if I go back to Tangier. Thanks for all your hard work and hope to see you all soon. Peter Faull

Managment and staff went above and beyond while I was there for the 8 weeks. I would like to thank each and every one of you for your service. All of you were very friendly and welcoming. You were there whenever we needed somthing. Thank you again!

column3: !!!! Amazing staff !!!! My home away from home
column4: I had an amazing time staying at the Hilton Garden Inn. I stayed at the Hilton from October 1 though to November 29 2017 for work. The staff and I mean all of the staff are amazing. Raja and Sara in the lounge were always there when you needed them and always with a smile. I stayed on the 12th floor and the hotel cleaning staff always made sure I had everything I needed. Fatima Raji from house keeping went above and beyond her hotel cleaning duties and was always smiling and always asked me how my day was. The ladies and gentlemen in reception were always there when you need something and i never had to wait for anything. The breakfast was amazing and the staff opened up the restaurant in the mornings a half hour early for myself and my colleagues because of our work schedules.…

Good Hotel, excellent location near the "Marina" and the sea, in the newest area of the city with several restaurants and cafes all around. Also very good quality / price relationship. Good choice in Tangier.

I have stayed at this Hilton Garden Inn during several business trips. The staff has always been wonderful, the rooms/bathrooms very clean, and the food tasteful. This is my first choice for sleeping accommodations whenever I am in Tangier.

We had a wonderful stay at the Hilton Garden Inn with our two small children over Thanksgiving weekend. The staff was amazing -- from getting us a baby crib to greeting us by name everywhere we went in the hotel to making special treats for our 3-year old during our breakfasts at the hotel restaurant. The location is great for exploring Tangier, although you need a car to get to the Kasbah and old city, it is walking distance to the beach and the corniche as well as the new Tangier Mall and the train station.

We stayed here in November of 2017. We had amazing customer service. The hotel was clean and the rooms were immaculate. I also much state that the breakfast was phenomenal. I would recommend this hotel 100%

The housekeeping service was outstanding. Chafika and Warda both went out of their way to provide clean and comfortable facility. I look forward to returning soon. The decor of the room is contemporary and stylish.

column3: Excellent Hotel with an excellent & great Staff
column4: Excellent Hotel with an exceptional & great staff! Great location, very friendly staff, large room & very very clean with a great view on the sea! The breakfast restaurant offers a great variety of good options and fresh juices. I travel a lot for my job and this hotel by far has the most very polite & professional service at the reception, the restaurant, security folks, and even housekeeping. Warm thanks and appreciation for all the staff :)

Rooms were well kept by house staff. Thanks to Warda and Soukaena for that. Restaurant , top notch! Nekina, Assadouqu, Hanane were amazing during our time. A+ service during our stay. We would recommend this to anyone traveling to Tangier.

Very nicely appointed guestrooms & toiletries. The room was large, comfortable & very clean. It is centrally located and next door to the mall and Asima (grand supermarket). Plenty of grand taxis right across the hotel. The breakfast restaurant offers a great variety of good options and fresh juices. I travel a lot for my job and this hotel by far has the most very polite & professional service at the reception, the restaurant, security folks, and even housekeeping. Warm thanks and appreciation for Younis , Abdullah and Samir at the restaurant, and Fatima, Asia, Huda, and Meriem at the front desk. You guys are AWESOME!!

column3: Basic decent 4-Star property, good for a short stay
column4: We stayed here 2 nights. It’s biggest positive is the convenient location - there’s a mall right next to the hotel (which has a supermarket, many eating options and a cinema), beach is literally across the street and the old town (Grand Socco) is a 25min stroll along the beach. Rooms are very basic though the sea view rooms do have a good view over the beach and on to the sea. Breakfast had a decent spread with a hot station making fresh omelettes. However overall the service was mediocre at best. Each table had a sign saying we could order the coffee and hot dishes with the waiter, but when we tried we were told it’s self service. This meant each guest had to stand in a long queue stressing the poor one chap making the eggs! Hotel overall felt a bit understaffed as well.…

We stayed at the hotel for a day. Very nicely appointed guestrooms & toiletries. The room was large, comfortable & very clean. The main restaurant served a wide spread but was not excited by the food. It is centrally located. Plenty of grand taxis right across the hotel. One can also hail petit taxis on the road. Close to the medina & the port.Very polite & professional service at the reception.

Every thing was great! The hotel is one of the best hotels I have ever been. Good location ,nice food , the staff in restaurant were very friendly and nice. They show us a very good hospitality. I have been talking to my friends and I recommend to go to Hilton Garden Inn Hotel. I recommend it to all my friends.

First the positifs points: well located. Staff a the reception are professional and helpful. Room are clean and simplest decorated. I stay only 1 week and then I changed with a other hotel closed by. The reason way I changed the hotel was for the very bad attitude of the hostess a the breakfAst. I had a very inconfortable and embarrassing argue with one of them in front of my family and to all the other clients.

Great hotel, all facilities you can imagine and ask for. Exceeded all expectations. By far the best HGI I have stayed in. Where do I start. Comfortable room, cooling works, nice amenities and in room coffee with exceptional WiFi. Amazing location and walking to the beach, ferry to Morocco and shopping. It felt like a many more stars than the hotel I stayed in Fes and was advertised as 4 stars. The breakfast and dinner buffet for guests is very cheap and great many choices including Tajin, deserts as many types of salads and main dishes. I would highly recommend. Staff is outstanding. Restaurant staff was Courteous and treated us with respect and helped carry my food to the table.

The hotel was not far from the airport, was very clean and the staff at the reception was fast to checking in. the room and bathroom were comfy, clean and very modern. they have a shopping center really on the side of the hotel that is a plus, you can buy what you need in the short distance. The restaurant service a little slow, but reasonable price.

We stayed here for three days and it was fabulous. The staff was awesome! Friendly, professional and pleasant all the time.The breakfast buffet was great. The room had a wonderful view of the ocean and the city. It was a corner room. It is located in a great location close to change money, mall, grocery store in mall, etc. Just a block from the ocean. Taxis easily accessible. I will definitely return to this hotel if I go back to Tangiers.

Stand at the Hilton Garden regularly with work. Also find the hotel comfortable and the room clean. On my last trip thanks to Bovchuc, Wafa and Chafika who kept my room clean and tidy all week. Staff in the restaurateur always friend and happy to help, its a same the al cart menu is not more extensive.

I had a great experience at the Hilton Garden Inn. The hotel is in a great location and has a great team working at the hotel. The hotel is first class. I really would like to commend Houda (I hope I spelled her name right) and Mohammed at the Front Desk for their friendliness and professionalism. When I checked in they provided me with excellent customer service and made me feel very welcome to be at their hotel and city. In the restaurant I had a most welcoming and pleasurable experience with three members of that team. Hanane, Nekina, and Admane were wonderful hosts and made me feel right at home. They were very friendly and helpful in helping me to understand the menu and my eating options at the hotel. I had a great meal there based on their recommendations and great…

The Hotel is very organized and with very professional Staff. Housekeeping is made adequately and all services functioning as expectable. Breakfast is very good and the people are very friendly and full of energy first hour in the morning. Located near a big shopping with a supermarket, this Hotel is perfect for business travellers. No uncorfortable luxuries normaly dedicated to Turism.

The hotel was on a great location, near to the main area and on top of a very convenient shopping mall, right in front of the beach. We´ve felt very welcome since our arrival to the hotel, with the staff continuously looking out for our well being. The breakfast is amazingly fresh and with good variety.

It was a good hotel, wish the internet was little faster. The location of the hotel is good. The view is amazing. Some good restaurants near the hotel. The staff was nice. The internet was slow, i wish it was little faster. The room was very clean. I wish the hilton inn had a rooftop for staff. But the view from the window hotel is great.

We stayed few days in this hotel. It was a good experience comfortable rooms.good service Hotel staff was very friendly, especially Assia in the Reception and Laila Houskeeping . The hotel is really good.next to cornich and City Center Will defenitily come back.

Great service and staff. Special thanks to Basma for her hospitality and good manners. Rooms were clean Location is excellent Price is reasonable Breakfast was absolutely fabulous and food was fresh Will definitely visit again

We stayed 8 nights in this hotel. Nice clean hotel. Housekeeping very good. Staff very polite. Room service is quick and polite. Rooms are very wel designed. A very good stay with wife and kid. The best 4 star hotel in Tanger!!!!

This hotel is located close to the beach and in the "new" section of town. There are plenty of restaurants and cafes nearby. There is plenty to see and do here and its not a million miles from the Medina etc. The staff are very helpful and pleasent. The rooms are clean tidy and well sized. This hotel is a great place to base yourslf for a time in Tangier.

The new Hilton garden inn in Tanger Morocco is the best Hilton garden inn I ever stayed. The place looks so fancy and the stuff are so nice. I want there with my family. we were very happy with the management and all the employees. They are ready for any service we asked for.

We have spent the best short break in HGI tangier. Jaouad at the time of check in was very professional and Houda did our check out in the best manner. The breakfast experience was excellent, we have been so pampered, I would like to thank the team especially chef Marwan and Samir for the wonderful time.

I would recommend this hotel for those looking to stay close to the train station- while the area itself is still under development and subject to pickpocketers, our hotel was accommodating, clean and the staff was hospitable. Although when we arrived there was no record of the reservation- I think this was more a function of very last minute booking through Booking.com-regardless when we arrived at 9AM they were able to accommodate us immediately. Also, I was able to book the room for the day rate since we were only staying for 10 hours-which was great! The room itself was modern, clean and comfortable. The breakfast buffet which was included for us was very convenient as we were starving upon arrival- and delicious! The hostess/wait staff were so welcoming- especially our…

I really like the staff, especially from my maid Fatima Bouzaioli she is professional, friendly and very competent and efficient and above all hard work. The facilities are very nice, warm and comfortable.

column3: If you speak English- look elsewhere
column4: One of my friends in our group was actually the one to book this hotel. We arrived on Sunday and left early on Wednesday morning. We called to have a car pick us up from the airport and bring us to the hotel when we arrived. That was fine, until we were checking in and the gentleman who dropped us off called the hotel from his cell phone outside and the receptionist handed us the phone. They were both trying to sell us camel rides + tours, before we even got upstairs! It was extremely unprofessional and rude for her to have handed us the phone, assuming we wanted to talk to this stranger. The room was very clean and comfortable. The gym is like brand-new, I'm not sure many people use it, but it had exactly what we needed. The front desk staff was just extremely unhelpful the…

Stayed here for a a few weeks and it was very good. The location is close to the railway station , to the beach and to a new shopping centre , should shopping/cinemas interest you ! I stayed on the 13th floor and the girl who did the housekeeping there was great, very helpful and did a good job. The hotel does not have a pool or any outside space actually but I think this is the usual for the Garden Inn brand , as they are more a business style place to stay I believe. ( I have stayed in 3 of them before) There is a popular bar area on the ground floor which is a good meeting point. The breakfast buffet was also good , although the food at other times was not so interesting. Likewise the bar menu is limited but ok for a snack. The front desk staff were friendly and…

column3: Great experience would def go again!
column4: Great service at the front desk and restaurant and all around. Had a little mix up about whether I had to pay at the desk but had already paid online. No big deal though and they fixed it right away. My wife and I and our 3 month old son staid 16th (top) floor in a Deluxe King Room (city view) Beautiful room, clean and modern hotel. Just what you'd expect from a Hilton Only difference between this 4-star and the 5-star Hilton down a little ways is this one doesn't have the pool. Breakfast was great for 120 MAD. Being right next to the Tangier City Center Mall was nice for a small stroll Would definitely come back!

Had the best Hilton experience ever. Staff was super nice and service minded. We stayed during my birthday and everyone in staff seemed to know and spoiled us. Very good location right by the beach and in (long) walking distance from city center

Very good cleaning by Wanda and Khawla ( from House Keeping),all staff are very helpfull and professional,esspecially at reception.I very like return back to Tanger and I am sure that I want to stay at this hotel.

We stayed here for one month and living in 10th floor , Ms. Bouzaidi Fatima was the assigned housekeeping , She's so trustworthy staff , for cleanliness you can rely on it , she cleaned like in her own room . Hope to see her in a higher position .

I resided at this hotel for about 3 weeks. Location is great. Staff is reasonably nice except the guy who makes the omlette during breakfast. I challenge you to ever make him smile or try to be positively responsive! Food quality is medium and variety is limited. Several times, I witnessed the shortage of more than one of the open buffet items. When guests requested a refill, waiters rarely cared to respond. No Spa, Hammam, or even a swimming pool, which is extremely strange for a hotel in Morocco not to have!

Hilton Garden Inn Tangier City Center was one of my preferred hotels in the Hilton group. I have without any doubt enjoyed my last stays in the hotel and have shared the same feedback with the management, other Hilton hotels… However, looking at the way my booking has been managed this time it was completely unprofessional! I had to send couple of emails, call the hotel couple of times, send an escalation to the WW Hilton…. In order to get an answer after more than 3 weeks. It seems that the hotel has lost some of the good employees (Mehdi, Hafsa…) and this has impacted the quality of the front office service. I had the intention to extend my stay for one more week but because of that, I have booked in another hotel for the second week of my stay. It’s unfortunate to say that…

column3: House Keeping at this hotel is excellent.
column4: This hotel is excellent. I enjoyed spending 2 & half weeks in it. Breakfast is amazing and the Wifi is fast and reliable. The location is great as well. The rooms are very clean and the House Keeping are very professional and keep the rooms in Tip Top conditions. Our lady that cleaned the rooms, her name is Warda, she is great and very professional.

Rooms were clean and quiet. My house keeping service was excellent and was provided by Wafae on 14th floor. Laundry service was awful. It took them 4 days to find my laundry. One of my friend had lost a sock and a shirt. I would not use their laundry service. Breakfast was good. The dining room staff were very nice but the service is slow. I did not eat lunch or dinner there. Exercise room is below average. Location is excellent. Walking distance to Casbah is about 20-25 minutes. Bank with currency exchange and mall are next door.

Downtown Tangier Great rooms, clean et quiet. Sea view better in 06 rooms than 04 (high wall). We were at 626 and kids at 1504. Small but good gym. Next to the beach but no bikinis and not so clean beach. Walking, seing downtown, old medina, port... Great location ! Close to an excellent italian restaurant Dall Italiano ! Go and have a drink at the Hilton for a view Great breakfast bla ffet with real,y nice staff

We enjoyed our stay there!The staff was helpful,high quality meals and very spacy and comfortable bedroom.Extra points for the two free bottles of water offered in the room.I would definitely recommend it!

The highlight was surely the service provided by the staff (reception, dining area, security, and housekeeping). Too many individuals to thank by name. They all ensured a positive experience for my family. See you next year!

My family and I stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn for 2 nights as the starting point in our Morocco trip. And we couldn't have asked for a better start to our holiday. We were made very welcomed and comfortable. The rooms were excellent and the location it self was fabulous with the mall, beach, restaurants just walking distance. The facilities were in excellent condition and the staff at the reception were very helpful. The highlight of our stay was the breakfast. The food was excellent and the service was beyond excellence. Nadin, in particular was one of the best waiters we've had. He was very courteous and pleasant. He made our breakfast a talking point through out the day with his mono-cycle and juggling. He added a new touch to how to serve customers which we really…

Great location, very friendly staff, comfortable rooms exactly as you'd expect from a Garden Inn. However, restaurant service could definitely be improved - many tables that hadn't been cleaned at breakfast and long waits for service at lunch. Menu is ok, but hasn't changed in 6 months. Rooms are clean, functional and well looked after. Lifts are terrible and slow, leaving you with a 5-10min wait at peak times, especially on upper floors. Some issues experienced with fire alarms being set off (likely from smoke from rubbish burning around Tangier). Car parking tight, but was always available. Enjoyable, spacious and friendly staff - thanks!

column3: Superb Staff!! 3 months experience! Almost second home
column4: The staff was genuinely gentle and helpful and the room just as peaceful and relaxing as i hoping for. credits to Meriem, Oumaima,Houda, Basma, Khalid Tariq, Yasser, at the reception desk who was always smiling and most willing to help. Thanks to housekeepers Khawla Hamdan, Wafae El Yamani, took impeccable care of my room, Nassima from restaurant! Missing many more staff, but thank you all!!

New hotel in the center of town . We stayed with family four days. Breakfast was excellent Fairouz, Abdeaziz, hala and the chef made it so personal. They were always helping out and make sure we had great time. The rooms are good size and clean . Our room had partial view of the sea. Walking distance there is mall and many restaurants.Overall it was a plesent stay.

The service was very good, tidy rooms , and friendly staff, Specially housekeeping supervisor sukaina and tariq, wafa, khawla . There's one thing I'd like to see it improved which is the room service they take long time to serve orders

Very comfy stay at the Hilton garden inn in Tangier. Great staff all around, especially Khaola and Wafae who always had a smile and took impeccable care of my room. Will definatley come again and will recomend!

Hotel very good,nice staff (khawala and wafae are the nicest)!clean room,good food!sometimes too much noise from outside! Near by you have a lot of restaurants to go, and the beach(unfortunately is very dirty)

My job forces me to travel a lot and spend 5 days a week in hotels. This hotel is excellent and very impressive. Very clean, takes their customers satisfaction very seriously. It has an amazing view to the ocean and glued to the mall. The highlight of the hotel is the staff who are very accommodating. MERIEM at the reception is so welcoming, she has this sweet soft smile that makes me feel at home every time i come. She always goes out of her way to make sure my stay is as comfortable as possible and shows tremendous care. And to top it all, she calls the room after i get in to make sure I am happy with the room. This is VIP treatment and i greatly appreciate it. I highly recommend this hotel. it is the BEST.

Very friendly, good food, house keeping (Bouchra and Warda) help me in everything. The people in Morocco are very friendly. The hotel is very good!We truly recommend this place. I walk near the hotel has restaurants, shopping center and near the beach.

column3: To be perfect just needs a swimming pool.
column4: Very friendly and helpful staff. Good food overall, and close to the beach and shopping mall, but no swimming pool. Does have alcoholic beverages available at the shop and restaurant. Room 618, Khawla Hamdan

column3: Disappointed with Staff. No pool access. West side rooms overlook stagnant pond. Poor internet.
column4: Disappointed with the staff at the two Hiltons in Tangier, Morocco. Not up to Hilton standards. No pool at the Hilton Garden Inn, but one at the new Hilton around the corner. Part of a large group reservation at both hotels. Told we could use the pool at the other Hilton by our group leader. Refused by the manager of the new Hilton when we walked there (Younice) & policy repeated by the staff at the Garden Inn while we were at the desk in our swimsuits. Not good for customer service. My room view is of a construction site & a stagnant pool out the west side of the hotel. Recommend rooms on the north (beach) & east side for better views. Very challenging internet service made it tough to complete a review.

I stay in this hotel for the second time with my family The service and the quality is great also the location is the best location in tanger We will stay again Thanks for the house keeping lady in floor 5

The hotel is new, nice room also the view it's amazing ! Breakfast was delicious many Morroco choices 😬 Location helps a lot, one bad point this hotel don't have swimming pool 😢 apart from that good hotel to stay 😀

Was very glad to stay at this Hilton property on a short stay in Tangers after a few days in Chefchaoeun. Although it was only for obe night, the location and the high level of service made it worth the extra cost for 2 rooms for our family. The hotel is very classy and elegant with friendly staff and very comfortable rooms. It is right next door to a shopping mall and the Hilton which has a very nice roof top lounge. The hotel is very near a nice sandy beach and the main avenue along the ocean with all the restaurants, bars and cafes. It is also in walking distance to the port and medina area if you like a longer walk. We booked a tour with the hotel for a 2-3 hour drive to take is to all the main tourist spots outside the old part of the city.

Hotel staff are friendly and accommodating. The bed was comfortable and the decor is soothing. It is a short walk to the Mediterranean. Although construction is active across the street, the rooms are quiet.

column3: Very good hotel for Business Trip
column4: Very near to the train station & to all commodities for Shopping, dinner,... Very nice staff always available & with all the help that you need & a beautiful smile ! Very comfortable furniture & clean rooms. Beautiful view also on "Tangier Corniche"

Beautiful hotel, excellent service , great location! Would recommend in a heartbeat!!! rooms very clean & large, breakfast in the morning was very good & the gym is well kept. the price us very reasonable!

column3: Wonderful and perfect stay for ten days.
column4: We had an excellent stay at the Hilton Garden Inn. It is a perfect location, near the beach, restaurants, and train station. We will fefinitely stay there again. The service was excellent. We had magnificent views of the sea each morning.

ROOM excelent ,clean RECEPTION polite and helpfull personal BREAKFAST AREA kind and ready to satisfy all your needs ,BAR the same excelent personal ;ROOM SERVICE quick and very kind also always calling back asking about the quality of food . EMPLOYEES NAMES: Warda HOUSE KEEPER 9 th FLOOR RECEPTION :Myriam and also her collegue working at the shift but I cannot remember his name .

Enjoyed the bar tremendously. The drinks were great. The sandwiches delicious and the bar staff very helpful and friendly. The hotel was booked so we couldn't get rooms. The hotel is mostly for business.

about room cleaning it is one of the best hotels i have been in. i have to thanks khawla hamdan for the room cleaning. She is very professional and kind. i will be here for more than 3 weeks and for me that is very important

Superb stay right from the moment i checked in. Staff were extremely friendly and since it was the Ramadan period when i visited, the property was rather empty, making service even more personable. The view i had from my room of the sea was also to die for. Definitely value for money considering a night only cost 10,000 hiltonhonors points. Will be back if i ever get the chance to.

This hotel is my "second house" for 21 days. I strongly recommend this hotel in Tanger. The best one in the city without a doubt. All the staff is amazing, especially the receptionists and the room service. Special note to the employer Khawla Hamdan that leaves my room always perfect, and helps me with everything I ask her. Everytime that I'll comeback to Tanger I hope to stay at this hotel.

The say was excellent , arrival/departure service ok. the location of this property is good. The room is very clean. The restaurant food very tasty. I recommended this hotel for business and family stay

Superior hotel and excellent people nice staff and always in a good welcome. The front desk staff is perfect for the room and the hotel is nice and clean. The rooms are nice and with lots of space. Cleaning service was perfect because Miss Kawtar was always there. The supervisor of my floor (3rd floor) Miss Leila Amiri was exceptionally gentle and always smiling ... Congratulations to all staff in the front desc and to the manager I especially thank the girls of my reception and of my "heart" Basma, Houda, Chaimae, Oumaima, Meriem, Assia.... I stayed here for 5 days and I would stay for a life with these stuff... I look forward to it,

Excellent hotel. Opposite the beach. Train station 2 minutes walk, taxis everywhere, restaurants everywhere. Shopping Mall next door to hotel. The hotel is in location that allows you to travel very easily to other parts of Tangiers by walking

Great hotel, very friendly staff, nice and very clean rooms. Good value for money. Restaurants are great. Good variety for the breakfast, great quality items. A la carte restaurant has a small variety but good quality.

The hotel is extremely clean and high quality. The staff couldn't be more friendly and helpful. The restaurant has excellent food and it's a great location. Highly recommended to anyone looking for a place to stay in Tangier.

column3: Experience at the Hilton garden inn
column4: The location of the hotel was excellent, coupled with the attentive and overwhelming staff. All staff members were very sharp and knowledgeable. The breakfast was very impressive. Ther was a huge array of food imginable. There was something for everyone

Such a beautiful hotel. During my actual visit I stayed in room 1117 with nice view. Rooms are very quiet. Food is great and the personnel is also nice and qualified. Noura from house keeping is also quick in her work and cleans everything just perfectly! Very close to the beach and to the Tanger Mall. Come and see by yourself.

My friend and I booked a room here, however, plans changed and we could not make it to Tangier. We had a very difficult time communicating with the hotel as no one that answered the phone spoke English after multiple attempts. I attempted to see if we could get a refund and they would not work with us at all. Very disappointing as this is a Hilton hotel.

This Hotel is very close to Tangier corniche and plenty of restaurant just with in the walking distance from the hotel and also very close to the train station if you are on your way to visit the rest of the country, you can just walk from the hotel to the train station about ten minutes away. Over all the hotel is in a great location you wouldn't be disappointed staying at this hotel.

Close to the ferry landing and beaches. The staff here make this stay absolutely perfect. Everybody carries on with a smile that will be sure to last well beyond after check-out. Was here on business but would quickly register for a family outing if the chance was there. Breakfast selection was outstanding.

The main benefit of this Hilton is it's perfect location. Next door to the main train station as well as a large modern mall and supermarket. Married with the sea views from the rooms you couldn't really ask for more. The rooms are of the quality you would expect from the Hilton group, and the breakfast has almost everything you could possibly want. The staff are friendly and helpful, nit at all corporate, as one might expect. The place to stay in Tanger!

column3: Tanger Hilton - A Home away from Home
column4: Smiles. Wherever you look from the Check in to the floor chambermaids, to the restaurants and the bars , room service, even a call from the technician to show me the airco system everyone ! Willing to assist with a smile . Simply Great ! bravo to all A hotel where they want to make sure you feel at home. Assistance

column3: The best deal for the money, excellent breakfast
column4: We were very happy to be in an American hotel. After staying in riads and other Moroccan hotels we felt at home at this Hilton. The room was of American standards. There was laundry which did not work that day. The highlight of this hotel was the excellent breakfast which was very reasonably priced. This hotel is situated in middle of the downtown, walking distance from the train station. This hotel should be seriously considered by the avid traveler.

Upon arrival we were greeted nicely and the transaction was smooth, then went up to our room and waited for our luggage to be delivered but no one delivered them. I called the front desk and asked for our luggage to be delivered and still nothing. After almost an hour and half I went downs stairs and asked the lady to get someone to bring us our luggage. they showed up 10 minutes later. The next day my wife and I went out and returned late afternoon and to our surprise the room was not cleaned our the bed was made. I called house keeping and the sent someone up (This is ridicules). The cleaning lady was done and advised that fresh towels will be sent up. an hour later and still no towels what so ever. House keeping extension was busy so had to call front desk again (twice) to…

My overall stay at the Hilton was splendid with a few exceptions. My first night they accidentally brought me a hairdryer at 1am and disrupted my much needed sleep. Then the chicken in my club sandwich was undercooked. However Noura, the housekeeper lady, and everyone at the reception desk was exceptionally helpful in their respective capacity; whether it was recommendations or cleaning the room. When I return to Tangier for business or pleasure, I'll be sure to stay at the Hilton Garden Inn.

This modern hotel is conveniently situated close to the beach. It caters for tour operators and individual business customers. Unlike some Moroccan hotels, the staff is very well trained, attentive and polite. The buffet breakfast includes fresh orange juice and local fruit and is good without being exceptional. The rooms are reasonably spacious. The hotel operates a policy of “focussed service” which apparently means a more limited service than is usual for four-star hotels. The mini-bar is empty and drinking water is supplied free of charge only for the first night’s stay. No hairdryers are available unless asked for. Existing guests can find that rooms are made up late in the day, depending on the hotel’s occupancy, with new guests being given preference. Clean towels are…

column3: Compliments to staff of Hilton Garden Inn for being professional and service minded.
column4: All staff at the Hilton Garden Inn are professional and service minded. They always service clients with a friendly and professional way. Special compliments to Ms Fatima Ebuzidi who takes care of the rooms, 10th floor. A polite, smiling person who delivers a neat and clean room.

My first time in Tanger and it was amazing. Great hotel , great service , great food ! I will return for sure. Special mention to Warda from House keeping for making my room always fresh and clean! For a good view book rooms from 9th floor up.

column3: It has been a really good experience, and the staff is amazing.
column4: 907 is my room number. Belhassane Warda from house keeping keep checking and making sure everything I needed was there for me and she did an excellent job cleaning my room in a timely fashion. I really appreciated the service she provided for me.

The hotel personnel was really well trained and extremely kind. I have no remarks to do. The position is really near to the city center and to the seaside. It is also near to the medina and you can catch a cab quite easily for few dirhams. It was a great experience.

column3: a wonderful 2 nights stay at Hilton
column4: I had the pleasure to stay 2 nights at this lovely hotel during a conference. Its location makes it very convenient for both business and pleasure travelers. It's situated across from the train station. right next to it, there is a nice restaurant and a mall is also nearby. For the beach lovers, Hilton is less than 5 minutes walk to the local white sandy beach. The rooms are new with comfortable beds. All the staff was efficient and the breakfast was excellent. I am definitely going to go back again.

Friendly staff and great service! Every section in the hotel contributed in making the stay enjoyable. The location of the hotel is very strategic, in the middle of Tangier, you can enjoy an amazing view as well go around the city by foot. Everything needed is provided within seconds from a very approachable and welcoming staff. A home far away from home.

Can do much more with transportation and room quality for exemple, offer the breakfast and daily water bottle. The Hotel is well placed in the city center. It will be a great choice for business trip. It was the second time i stay in this hotel.

Perfect. Everything was just perfect. Service, sleep, view, oh my God, view, i have never better view like here, directly on Atlantic ocean. Location, rooms, staff, bar... Awesome. My best wishes to all, and hope i'll return here one day.

I stopped over for night on my way touring the area. The hotel offers rooms to a good Hilton standard and they still feel brand new. They quiet for a good nights rest and clean.The breakfast was surprisingly excellent with everything one would expect of a Hilton. There is a new mall below the hotel and the the waterfront is just across the street. Overall the location is good and a place I would consider staying at again.

We have traveled to Tangier numerous times in the past year and we continue to book at the Hilton Garden Inn. Initially we were told it had the best buffet in Tangier and since we’ve been staying there, we have been happily surprised by the level of service that has been provided. From the reception management to housekeeping staff to the food and beverage management. The staff - from top to bottom - were tremendously helpful and went out of their way to make us feel at home. Special mentions must go to Rajaa who organized meals for our special diet requirements, as well as Hafsa and Jaquad at reception and last but not least Wafae, our regular housekeeper, who spoke fluent English and addressed all of our needs.

column3: Good room, others not that much
column4: Located really closed to the beach and port Big room, nice and new furniture Lobby quite small Service must be improved urgently: for instance one whole night phone not working and nobody worried about it Right now one good option in Tanger but under building new ones

Great views, great atmosphere, hotel is like brand new modern design..... excellent service I will definitely recommend anyone visiting Tangier. Close distance to nearby attractions: beach/mall/city centre walk.

Overall good expreince staff very help good breakfast there is no swimming pool or sauna if that's what you are looking for in heart of city center next to tangier city mall which is good advantage lots of resturant in mall

The check-in, room design, wifi, service and the location of this place make it one of the best in Tanger. Some good restaurants just walking distance. walking distance from The sea. The breakfast was excellent.

The hotel is lovely! Clean and staff willing and eager to assist in any way. Beds were like floating on clouds. The breakfast was fantastic as they had a bit of all to choose from or they will make you what you want.

Excellent experience they made our room so romantic. Very happy. My wife and I were treated with so much courtesy even that we arrived very late from the wedding reception. Excellent hotel and staff. Beautiful ocean view.

I stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn Tangier with my wife, and we absolutely loved it. The hotel is conveniently located next to a mall, and very close to the city center. Check in was a smooth experience as it always is with Hilton hotels and we went up to our sea view room. We arrived at night so couldn't see much, but when we woke up the following morning, the view of the Mediterranean Sea was amazing. Breakfast was top notch, with an omelette bar, bread station, and separate buffet areas. Only regret I have is that we only stayed here for two days, next trip, we will definitely spend more time here!

Superb staff very friendly and helpful. More like a proper 5 star hotel. The best in Tanger. Killer view from my room. thank Warda who's in charge of the housekeeping on the 9th floor for her dedication to her work and general helpfulness

stayed here for 3 weeks. nice kind smiling staff in the front desk. always ready to help and do their best. BIG THUMPS UP Guys !!!! :-) :-) House keeping did a good job. thx Warda B. for always being helpfull . Breakfast staff are fast and alwas helpfull. I never needed coffee . ;-) im looking forward to return.

This is my third stay at this hotel I can't praise the the staff and service any more they are brilliant and can't do enough for you alway very helpful,on my third day Mohamed restaurant manager know exactly what I wanted and greeted my on my arrival by name,and said would bring everything to me. Havsa on reception was excellent on check in and very helpful with local information and trips Hotel is in a good location if you want to explore morocco by train as the station is just 3 minutes walk and there is a mall right next door. Madina is a short taxi ride. Cool hotel to return to after a long day out.

If you have to come to Tanger for Business you have to stay in the Hilton Garden Inn - next to your contacts you already had you can easily extend your network because everybody is there. The Staff is good, receptionists are super, good location, nice rooms and in and out the city center in 5 min with taxi.

Wonderful and central close to shopping mall, great restaurants and the beach. Front desk personnel are great, no waiting time and great rooms with fantastic room service and house keeping staff. Restaurant is good and security at this hotel is top! All in all a wonderful hotel! Will only use this hotel from now.

The staff is so helpful. They made some great recommendations of things to do and places to see. The hotel is beautiful and very safe. It is located next to a large mall that you can access without going outside if the weather is bad.

It is the first Hilton Hotel I'm staying at, so I don't really have a comparison term, but the hotel is new and clean, fairly priced, our room is spacious (the deluxe king suite I think it's called). The house keeping service is very good and I would like to thank Houda Boukhenfira. The breakfast is also good and varied. The only problem was with the parking space: sometimes the parking lot is full and they send you from one level to another. Also, every time we entered the parking they asked us the room number. Since we stayed here almost three weeks that was a problem. And another minus would be the bad smell, sometimes more pronounced in the evening, coming from a nearby river or the landfill. Anyway, overall, it is a very good stay.

Traveled with friends to visit the beautiful city of Tangier and traveled by ferry for a day trip to Tarifa, Spain. The locals were very friendly and welcoming at both locations. Highly recommend if you are so in the area!

Stayed at Hilton garden inn it was indeed a good choice! The hotel is new and cozy. It is walking distance from the beach and several cafes and restaurants. Old médina is about 5-10mins taxi. Besides the hotel is the Tanger city mall. The room is spacious, comfortable and clean. We ate dinner at the hotel. It was buffet. The hot dishes are few but tasty. But I have to say that they needed more improvements with their desserts. In terms of services the staff are all helpful.

column3: Friendly staff, good location, clean and new
column4: Very good business hotel located just behind the new revamped seafront in Tangiers. Stayed two nights in February so not really high season but cost/quality was excellent. Rooms are nice, clean and big (enough). Plus for comfy bed. Breakfast buffet is as expected - also very good albeit not that huge variety of choices. Recommend the omelette made to order or the pain au chocolate. No swimming pool though.

Great place to stay service is wonderful and you don't have to deal with the hustlers so called travel guides in the old city! I would highly recommend the hotel. The women at the front desk were exceptionally nice.

column3: Best value for money in Tangier
column4: Business trip to Morocco, Tangier. I`m traveling often to Tangier. Hilton Garden - best location (city center) and reasonable pricing. Breakfast is good enough. 200 meters from hotel - shopping mall with midsize supermarket and shops.

I stayed a night here at this newly opened hotel in the city center. You can see they really paid attention to the details and I was impressed by the modern and stylish decor througout the hotel grounds. The room I had looked out to the port waters and was spacious, clean and had everything one would need - including the slippers and robe I didn't have to ask for after all. There is a kettle with tea and coffee, fridge and safe. There was ample storage as well and a very effective heating and cooling system. Breakfast was plentiful and the seating area was large, so there was no crowding in the area, which can happen sometimes. I'd like to thank the staff for their awesome hospitality and professionalism, in particular, Meriem at the front desk. She was very cordial,…

Just what I expected: clean, warm welcoming staff, good service, parking in the basement. Very good location in the new city center and steps from the beach courniche I will definitely come back again

Great hotel with highly professional staff. Good rooms with excellent beds. Stayed for 3 weeks and were always meet with a smile. Preferred language is French, especially in the restaurant. Housekeeping is doing a great job

column3: Good hotel in the center of Tangier
column4: The hotel is fairly new with nice rooms. Great service and very friendly staff. What pulls my review down is slow internet and a very badly managed restaurant. Food is not up to Hilton standard which is a pain when you are travelling for business.

A very good & friendly Hotel located in the great business center of Tangier, very close to Tangier main Train station & the new Mall this Hotel good for Family , staff are rather pleasant & truly want to help.

I enjoy three nights very nice and the services very good and the staff very symphathy The breakfast very good and the restaurant/cafetaria very good and not expensive. The location very pleasant near the sea side and shopping center

column3: Hilton garden in a great place to call home in tangeer
column4: Amazing amazing staff great hotel I was shocked when I saw the bill it's to good to be true 3 nights for 130.00 usd wow with a beautiful clean rooms king size bed and a great view I can't ask for more in Gods will I will be back here very soon . The staff are just amazingly friendly specially Rajae at the bar she helps me and her colleagues like yahya about any questions I had about the city not to mention that she is really sweet . It's one great trip thank you all at the Hilton .

column3: Excellent place, friendly and helpfull staff
column4: This Hotel opened recently and I would like to say that they did great. The Hotel staff is pretty Young but we can feel that they were pretty well trained and that they are well managed. Rooms are spacious, clean, new and great. Bed and linen : fantastic. Room service is quite long : 20 minutes for refreshments but again the service very polite and nice. Breakfast : Nothing bad to say except good things and again new facility and friendly staff. Only minus : French TV sat (TF1, La2, La3) were not working. Otherwise, good to have a Hilton in Tangier! Good Luck!

We stayed one night at the Hilton and while this is a good hotel, it was definitely not the Hilton one would expect conc. meals and service. Location was fine, close to the beachfront (some rooms had great views). The room was relatively small. Nice touch - bed and shower were showered with rose petals ... so romantic! Complimentary: welcome dish with fruit - apples, oranges, kiwis, banana), coffee/tea facilities with range of tea bags, two bottles of water & one pair of slippers (a room for 2 should have two pairs, shouldn't it?). Bed was extremely comfortable. Bathroom - well equipped: 3 sets of towels; toiletry included shower gel, shampoo, body lotion and conditioner. Breakfast: quite good, but not much non-European choice and not much choice for vegetarians. Dinner: small…

One of the best choices I made to stay a night in Tangier, Morocco. This turned out to be a very good property, very clean and much better than the Hilton Gardens in the USA. The staff was very cooperative and caring. With my Hilton Honor credential I was allowed special late checkout.

Nothing less that you'll expect from a Hilton hotel. Great service and quality. It's near the Tangier Medina, a 25 minute walk or 5 minutes in car. Great place to stay in Tangier, Morocco. All the staff speaks English, but you'll find also people that speak Spanish and French. Also have a small bar to enjoy some beers at night. We didn't find any place that sell alcohol besides hotels.

At times due to commitments I have been unable to review a establishment for a month, but on this occasion think it only right to review on our return From the moment you enter this peaceful "Hilton Garden Hotel" Tangier you are made very welcome, not only with a smile but genuine warmth. The Hotel its self is maintained spotless, hard as you might look you will not find a piece of litter or a dirty ashtray anywhere. Our Kingsize room with extra large bed/bathroom was just as requested, with views to the coast in the day you could observe the coast into the distance, at night really spectacular views, all lit up along the coast, once again the room was spotless. Special thank you to Karmal Boudoud the F & B Manager who assured every meal exceeded our expectations, this…

Firstly, Happy New Year to all wishing everyone a good healthy year full of happiness. Secondly, HGIT staff well done.. many thanks to management, front desk, security, house keeping.... etc. Finally And Especially madam Raja from reception service is superb definitely next year 2018 will be here again. Best regards Fahad Mugharbel

I really enjoyed my stay here. It is in a great location with a view of the sea. The staff tried very hard to make my stay enjoyable. They were very knowledgeable about the local area and provided many helpful suggestions. The room was big and well furnished. The food was excellent and very reasonably priced.

during my 2 days visit a Tanger Morocoo,it was good choose to stay at Hilton Garden in, the great team working in this hotel have good experience, great service,very friendly ,smiley,very helpful,Thank you :)

Very nice friendly staff great location clean and nice room with excellent view. Reception staff make you feel welcomed with open arms. Special thanks to Hafsa and Rajaa they are so nice and very very helpful. I strongly recommend you talk to one of them for help. They speak good English. The breakfast buffet is good with nice selections also staff are so service oriented especially a guy name Sameer. I have been to so many hotels in tangier and this one is my top choice so far. The house keeping staff are also nice specially Wafa. She is so percise and keeps smiling my wife and I had a very nice stay Khaled GH..

column3: Great Stay at Hilton in Tangier!
column4: This hotel is only six months old and it looks very much like Hilton in the U.S. and Europe to me. Morocco is not known for customer service, but this Hilton Hotel had highly trained staff from the lobby to the restaurant. They were always eager to assist and seemed happy to have me there. I had a great night sleep in a room that had a great view of the mediterranean sea and sunrise as well as sunset. The room also had an ironing board and an iron which is not surprising for a Hilton but is at a hotel in Morocco. I definitely enjoyed my stay and would recommend it.

New, well set up hotel in relatively new area of Tangier, connected to the new mall. Close to the re-developed boulevard and main roads. Great breakfast, good, small but comfortable rooms, friendly and helpful staff.

Very nice hotel, clean, staff is profesionel . We had a room on the top floor with an incredible view.breakfest was good also . The hotel is well situated near shops bars and restaurant . Great place we to stay .

column3: superb hotel with a birthday surprise
column4: When i made the booking i mentioned in the comment section that we are celebrating a birthday during our stay in the hotel. Shortly after we arrived the restaurant supervisor knocked on the door and handed us a nice birthday cake to make the special occasion ever more special. I felt really moved by this gesture, we did not expect anything like that. The room was spacious, immaculately clean, everything comfy. The housekeeper serviced the room every day while we had breakfast, everything refilled, replaced, she even managed to mop on a daily basis. The breakfast was another highlight, a good selection of food and drinks, the chefs, the waiting staff always there to help us and the supervisor went beyond expectations constantly, a true asset to the hotel. Receptionists were…

The hotel is new , staff are friendly and location is superb near the mall and shops and close to the shore Hotel is new and it is the best in Tangier if compared to other in term of value of money against the sevice .

column3: Have everything but you have to ask for it.
column4: The hotel have everything but you have to ask for some things. Hair dryer and Iron you have to ask for. Nice located near the sidewalk by Mediterranean sea. Nice bufé dinner an breakfast I liked the hotel.

Hotel was conveniently close to the train station and a nice boardwalk area. Rooms very well equipped and clean. Staff were very helpful. Lounge area could be more comfortable. Some problem with taxi to Medina - we asked for a taxi and hotel arranged for a tour guide to take us. We ended up agreeing to go with the guide and we was not very good.

Everything was perfect... the room-very very clean-you will miss nothing in the room ! also TV has all programs! ...the stuff...the food amazing ! a 5***** Hotel for sure !!! very very friendly stuff... i will come back for sure.. thanks a lot for this perfect stay !!!

We had an enjoyable one night stay at this new hotel situated near the Tanger City Center Mall (which, by the way has a great food court), within walking distance to the Corniche and other dining options. The hotel is about six months old, nicely appointed with the same toiletries you find in the States. The room was very comfy with a nice view of the water. It was personally a nice change to be in a western hotel when typically we opt for Riads. We chose this hotel since we were taking the ferry to Tarifa, Spain, and the port was literally down the street and around the corner from the hotel. We live in Rabat, so we drove and it was nice to see that the Hilton had underground parking. We took a less than 10 minute cab for about 20 dirham to the medina area to eat at Le…

The hotel is brand new, just outside of the historic center of town – about 10 minutes by taxi (which is real cheap). This is what I will say: POSITIVE POINTS: Being a new hotel, everything is modern, new and up to spec with what you do expect from a brand new hotel. Everywhere I went in the hotel, it is spotless so I must commend the cleaning staff for their job. The room is a nice size, with a nice décor and with everything working flawlessly. Everything in the room was pleasant, including the bathroom. Amenities are perfect, and the shower pressure and hot/cold stability worked to perfection, allowing for a relaxing shower. The location (despite being a little out of the old center) is actually interesting. Shopping mall stuck to the side of the hotel, and a lot of good…

column3: My experience at the Hilton Garden Inn Tangier
column4: This is an excellent hotel, located in the City Center with the beach across the street, stores, additional places to eat, a new mall, walking distance to the train station and 30 minutes to the airport by taxi. The hotel staff were friendly and always making certain my room was clean and helped with my many questions. Great internet, food is delicious, although I only had breakfast due to my work. But, a great place to stay.

Stayed here for 10 days and had a wonderful time getting to know the hotel, staff and services. All deserve praise from the security guards, concierge, housekeeping and restaurant staff. Despite the language mishaps and misunderstanding, each staff is willing to go beyond expectation. The rooms are new and comfortable . An amazing view of the sea welcomes you each morning. Restaurant has its own view of the sea too. Breakfast and lunch buffet gives you local and international choices. Walking distance to the mall, supermarket and train station. One can actually walk along the beachfront all the way to the city center or the old city ( medina) and the souk. Definitely will stay again here with family.

I would like to recommend this hotel to anyone Nice location excellent service nice stuff and good food and Old employees door nice to me with a big smile with open arms and they make me feel like a home

Great hotel and awesomesome service! I think if you connect price and service a really good experience. We just stayed one day there but I would have stayed a wholr week. I can recommend this hotel to all which would like to stay in or pass by Tanger.

The Hotel Location is excellent. The services are from average to good. The parking needs to better managed. The rooms are very clean The Gym is good. The Tangier City Mall is just 2 minutes walk and the corniche just 5 minutes walk.

A very nice hotel in good location within walking distance to beach and a street full of nice restaurant to experience the moroccon gastronomics. I was given a free upgrade to deluxe room on 16th. Floor. The room is lovely the only two issues: 1. Very slow lifts in the hotel. 2. TV has very limited channels.

column3: Lovely hotel situated along the beach
column4: Nice room, shower. Restaurant not so good. Housekeeping cleaned the floor with dirty mop during breakfast service on both days while people wre having a meal. During the buffet dinner, there was no food, when it was repleshed, the quality was poor. Reception staff very friendly and helpful

This is my 3rd time to Morocco and first time in Tangiers and at this Hotel, stayed for one night onTuesday 4th October. Location: Located 50 yards from the shopping mall and 100 yards from the train station. We arrived from Gilbraltar via the ferry and took the taxi directly to the hotel which took about 15 - 20 minutes, nice journey through the promenade. Right next to the hotel is a bank is currency exchange shop and Mcdonalds is no more than a 5 minute walk if you fancy a snack. The shopping mall is very modern over 3 floors with the top floor having various outlets for eateries, like most shopping malls back in UK however very little branded shops. However in the evening you may wish to get a taxi (approx 20 - 30 dhm) to the Medina whiich is more lively, the taxi ride…

Perfect facilities, location & staff. We enjoyed our stay at HGI and we will definitely stay there whenever we visit Tangier again. Hotel is very clean, located in the mountains ddle of the city, 10 dhm taxi to old madina and 2 mins walking to Cornich.

I recommand this hotel because of its excellent location, and beautiful beach view. Its staff is very professionnel and helpful. A high quality service and a richly varied breakfast buffet. Also, confortable and spaceful rooms.

This hotel is in very good location, close to Tangier Mall and the Train Station, Tangier Beach and a lots of restaurants just with in the walking distance. Mr Mahdi at the Front Office was very helpful and friendly. Unlike the host at the grill restaurant by the name Oumaima. She is dishonest and can't be trusted stay away from her and don't let her recommend anything for you. Specially the taxis she works with taxis driver and she take commission from them.

The hotel is in a great location in front of the train station , near the sea and beside the only shopping mall in Tanger . A very clean hotel , the stuff was helpful and the room service was very good ... Would definitely choose it if I visit Tanger again .

column3: Excellent hotel for an excellent price
column4: Wonderful, clean and modern hotel in the center of the city. Very friendly staff. Particularly wanted to mention the receptionist Hajar who was excellent and took really good care of us. She also set up with a tour guide (Abdul) from IRT tours. it was an excellent idea and a great tour. Abdul was friendly, spoke excellent English and took us to all the worthy sites in Tangier for about 4 hours. Highly recommended.

column3: Very modern in a safe area
column4: The hotel is very modern however the walls are thin. The staff is very polite but seem to still be learning the business or I asked odd questions. The location is great if you want new Tangier but a distance from the old part of town, which is a must see.

This hotel is newly open so everything looks good. We booked a suite, it's clean, spacious, comfortable and has a great view over the sea. Good breakfast buffet. The staff is polite and helpful. Free and fast wi-fi, there are also some desktops in the business center, which is also free to access. The only miss is that the carpet in font of the elevators doesn't look clean. Hopefully they can do something with it.

i've never thought about reviewing a hotel before but after my short stay at the Hilton Garden Inn Tanger City Center i think that it would be very useful for other travelers to just know how gorgeous this hotel is. My husband and i spent 2 nights at the garden and we loved it. The room was very clean, the bed was very comfortable, and above all, the view was stunning! Chek-in and check-out went very smooth; the receptionists were professional and very welcoming. Another thing that i loved about Hilton Garden inn is the breakfast, (very yummy) and the waiters were very friendly. If you are planning your next trip to Tangier, Hilton Garden Inn is definitely the place to be!

Stayed there for the first and last night during a short leisure trip in Morocco. Not a typical Garden Inn, feels like a 4 star luxury Hilton. The building is stylish and brand new with excellent transport links. Good combination of contemporary and Moroccan style. Check in was faultless. We received a complimentary sea view upgrade as Hilton Honors members. Reception was very helpful and kind every time we approached them. Special thank you to Atef, front office manager, Hafsa and Jaquad. Our room was spacious, bright with a stunning view from the 14th floor. Breakfast has wide selection of delicious items. I strongly recommend to try the Moroccan specialities for lunch or dinner. My girlfriend tried lamb with apricot and prunes while I had chicken with olives and pickled…

Located not far from the seaside. Completely new. Rooms equipped properly (however no windows in the rooms. Therefore, not recommended if you are clostrophobic). Breakfast buffet is great. Staff lack experience though.

This is my first ever review of a hotel as I normally don't bother. On this occasion I feel compelled. I travel to Tangiers every six weeks through business and stay at an array of hotels dependent on pricing. I shall never stay at this subpar brand of a Hotel again. Room - My Suite, not room was not serviced until 3pm despite leaving at 8am, cause - they are busy, Room - Not cleaned correctly, and took 4 attempts to do so, Food - My 4 year old son could cook French fries better Hygiene - After constant complaints about mosquitos in the bar area housekeeping came and sprayed for 2 seconds, not resolved Front Desk - No idea what they are doing as each look to each other. Ops Mgr - Very helpful, complimentary wine sent to room and dinner comped. My favorite - Moving the…

This a new hotel in Tangier which is a very nice costal city across from Spain, the location, price, services are great, rooms are very clean. I use the Gym, which is very lemited in Equeoments ad whights , but it was also clean. Next to the hotel is a new Mall, and to the other side is a Macdonald .,which has a rather nice location for coffee or lunch.

Comfortable, clean, good location, very helpful staff, The bar is good, breakfast food needs slights improvements. but over all one of the best hotels in the town. Location is next to the only shopping mail in town,

Super clean hotel in nice & safe area. Great place for a family or business travel. Great service,variety of local foods, prime location & friendly employees. I will definitely recommend this hotel for a short visit or an extended stay.

very nice hotel, excellent location, extremely friendly staff. Located right next door to the mall and few steps away from the main train station. currency exchange also right next door. Extremely friendly and helpful staff. Would definitely recommend it for either buisiness or vacation.

Hilton Garden Hotel is new hotel just open six months ago, it s a big hotel well located in down town, tanger city mall is less than 100m ( 2 min walk) train station about 5 min walk , Mc donalds is 1 min walk. Check in was fast with big smile , Rooms are little small but clean , some rooms are see View which is perfect . breakfast are good but not perfect can be better. Location of the hotel is really perfect

I do not like to write negative reviews , however in this case I felt it necessary. I booked this room four months prior to our trip from the USA.I planned to stay 2 nights at the hotel. I am a diamond member and travel rather extensively. Sometimes people complain when things happen that are beyond the hotels control -I don't. The hotel must remember that no matter where its location, it is still an American corporation with loyal members-both male and female. I called several times to confirm the upper floor corner room with full ocean view. The hotel confirmed. Furthermore, up to a week before arrival the hotel seemed to be pretty vacant and each time i called the hotel to make sure all was in order, I was assured that it was 3 days before the trip i had an unexpected…

We were quite pleased with this hotel for are brief stay in Tangier. It was worthwhile paying for a water view room...a nice view into the bay. The breakfast buffet was excellent. our only complaint was that a number of typical amenities were missing from our room (e.g. robes, iron, hair dryer). The dryer was delivered upon request, though.

column3: it is one of the best hotels in Tangier
column4: The hotel is very comfortable , the staff r great specially ( Sara + Hafsa + Jawad ) and the front office manager ( Atif ) .Also they helped me and contact a transport agency to let me have tours in and around Tangier with good rates . The location is very good . a mall and a train station is nearby and the Cornish is only 2 minutes walking ..the old city of Tangier is 10 minutes drive ..I enjoyed staying in this hotel

staff was great professional and very kind, room wonderful, the food was tasty and fantastic, view beautiful , location great near restaurants shops, room clean big and comfortable. I definitely will came back and recommend it to my family and friends.

Good Hotel : This is a new hotel so the rooms are modern and spotless. We had the room in the corner next to the gym and it was really very spacious. Comfortable king sized bed. Good Location : This hotel is near the corniche and is adjacent to a new mall that has opened in the center of Tanger, which makes it very convenient as you can easily pass the time walking around the mall. You can catch a movie at the theaters, get a bite to eat at the food hall, and buy a little something from the supermarket downstairs. Cons: I would say that parking could be an issue once the hotel is full because we had a hard time finding space in front of the hotel a couple of times during our stay. I could be wrong but I'm not aware of any other dedicated parking spaces.

In the heart of Tangier Very clean hotel. Parking in basement available. Security. Very clean rooms. Front desk staff more than great, specially Mr atef , while checking out and after 4 hrs travelling to marakish I remembered that I forgot to take passport in safety box!! Atef kept room occupied for another 4 hours until we came back to open the safety box and took our things... Many many thank Atef. I highly recommend this property.. However, I didn't like when security staff in basement followed me to remind me that he is the one that helped taking my luggage to alovator to give tips!!

We stayed recently in this hotel, the reception staff were really nice, friendly, helpful and welcoming all throughout our stay. Restaurant and breakfast staff went the extra mile in terms of being attentive and polite during our stay. We had a delicious breakfast and dinner. Housekeeping staff were brilliant and exceed all expectations from Hilton standard. We were in Room 428 with a sea view which was very spacious and comfortable. I highly recommend this hotel, it is in a great location, very close to the train station and only a few meters from the beach. Samira

I've stayed with kids many times in this hotel, clean, relax and good customer service. The staff very polite, especially the breakfast personnel, they are very helpful and well trained. I struggled to use the safe and asked for help, in no time somebody came and teach us how to use it. Definitely I recommend this hotel.

We enjoyed our stay in Hilton Garden Inn. Everything went well since we checked in. The location is perfect, the staff are very friendly and helpful, the rooms are clean and comfortable. We definitely will be back here again

breakfast and launch staff come always ask us, i don t like staff come to see us what we need every seconds its too bad really, and also in breakfast when we have a buffet they want to serve us but, we really need to serve our self and we want to eat what we want.

The Hotel Location is very good .. you'll be near to the beach .. Near to the only Mall in Tanager & you have many choices of restaurants and coffee shops nearby. The hotel Restaurant has a little choices in their menu .. they Staff friendly ..

Booked a seaview room 3 months before arrival for 10 days and there were no seaview rooms available at check-in because the Saudi guest had priority. Although it is a non-smoking hotel the bathroom was not. Also, the room gets cleaned after 6PM. As a Hilton Honnor Diamond member I felt very disappointed because I have sent my compliant to the hotel by email and they never responded. The breakfast and location of the hotel are excellent.

I have stayed for the second time in Hilton Garden Inn Tangier and as usual the service was really excellent... The rooms were clean, the breakfast is a real pleasure, the staff are helping with style and smile... I would like to take the opportutity to congratulate the Hilton team for this excellence and also to thank them for their care during my stay with my little family. Special thanks to Tarek and Mehdi for being here to satisfy every need that we had during our stay. I wish I can be back theresoon. Karim

The room at the Hilton in Tangier was Outstanding. When we walked in I thought I was in a Palace! Well appointed and lovely suite. Folks and staff couldn't have been more helpful! Good dinners and breakfasts right in the hotel too! Hilton never lets me down!

Despite being informed that the check in started at 9am and booking our stay based on thatl, when arriving we were told that it was impossible to check in before 2pm rather rudely which resulted in a 5 hour wait in the reception. When we were given our rooms, one of them was not ready since the extra bed ordered wasn't set and the bathroom was not stocked for the 3 people staying there. However, the location is great and the breakfast is also good.

New, modern hotel. Excellent location near the beach, shopping malls and restaurants. Not all the rooms have water view. So if you want the view better check it during the reservation. The main restaurant is very nice and food is good.

column3: Tangier business trip, excellent choice to stay
column4: Hilton Garden Inn in Tangier is a brand new hotel, really nice location, near de beach and all the restaurants, excellent for a run or walk around the sea front. Very modern and well equipped, friendly and efficient staff and very good breakfast. Really a good option to stay

Incredibly comfortable hotel right in the heart of the city, only 2 blocks away from the Train Station. This hotel is near the beach, and offers plush 4-star service. We felt incredibly safe, welcomed, and comfortable here. Their dinner buffet was the highlight of our trip to Morocco. We feasted for over 2 hours, trying all of the local dishes. It was an incredible experience and we will never forget our time here!

+ New and well maintained hotel + Service is good but could improve (normal with new hotel and staff) + Food is wonderful and excellent. Much better and a variety of choice than what you get in the US. + Rooms are nice. Partial ocean view was great from the 7th floor and up + Though the hotel is a stone throw from the ocean front, if does not have balconies (unfortunately. Big ouch for such a beautiful city and view) + Stay was great
