Perfect Stay with friendly staff and a big simle good location and the breakfast was very Good with many moroccan items and the room also was good with a perfect view and clean i will try to stay in tanger again for the next time

Perfect Hotel, Friendly staff, Free parking, Comfortable beds, beautiful smell throughout the building. The room service food was acceptable. great location, right on the sea front, Definatley willl be visiting this place again.

Not been to tengire for ten years what a change old town to the new Town best off both worlds now and in the hart off the new Town you have the hilton garden Inn 5 star only 18 months old rooms are so clean and fresh and the same for the rest off the hotel staff so friendly and helpful.

Newly open (March 2016), large and well-equiped (including room shoes!) rooms, nice staff and awesome food (greate taset and huge variety). Great value for this price! 100m from the seashore, Medina within walking distance.

column3: New hotel with great service, with a few concerns
column4: We recently stayed at this hotel. It has only been open a few months. Everything is new, nice and clean. The hotel staff was very friendly. The room was very nice. The beds were very comfortable and everything was in perfect condition. To my surprise the internet was very fast and reliable - not something I see at many hotels! The hotel is right next to a new mall, which is also very nice. The mall also has a grocery store if you need to have any supplies during your stay. We felt very safe and secure at this property. The seaview room was not some hyped marketing...we had an awesome view! Our only negative was that outside the hotel there is strong sewer odor. There is substantial construction going on in this area of Tangier and it may be related to that, but the…

Good reception, good bar, good breakfast, no noise, room was clean but small details like WC seat not well fixed, flow of water from the shower was small . All the area arround the hotel is under construction, so seight seeing is not so beautifull

column3: Beautiful place in brand new hotel
column4: Perfect place to stay in tangier city, beach front view, top class hotel, super friendly staff at the reception ( + got a suite upgrade) and breakfast was one of the best. Great variety of nuts, fruits, sweets :) and beach view as well enjoy the stay there

column3: Nicely appointed, clean and staff who speak excellent English!
column4: This hotel is located very near the beach and a 20 dirhams (~2 Euros) taxi ride from the Media and kasbah area. It was nicely furnished and the front desk staff were very helpful and spoke excellent English. This hotel is a fine option for those who enjoy resting well at night so the events of the day can be enjoyed most thoroughly.

column3: HGI Tangier combines location with quality
column4: I stayed at HGI Tangier twice in early April and I'm glad that I made the choice. The rooms are well designed, the dining room choices not elaborate but well chosen, and the staff friendly and efficient. They are all comfortable in English, Arabic, French, and Spanish. I recognized some of the staff from other quality hotels in Morocco, so the employees are also aware that the Hilton chain is a good employer. The Internet is sometimes quite slow, but this is a city-wide problem. HGI management should join many other businesses and cultural institutions in asking for better service. The hotel was in its second month of operation during my visit, so there were some minor issues that were quickly resolved. In my experience, when a hotel can take responsibility and resolve issues,…

We only had breakfast here but what an amazing breakfast it was!! Hamza cooked a fabulous omlette, we all went for seconds!! Thanks Hamza for your friendly service and delicious omlette. Unfortunately I can't comment on the rooms but the hotel was welcoming and charming.

My first hotel experience in Morocco and I was amazed by the knowledge, professionalism of the staff and their willingness to help. I'm a big traveler and since I work in the hotel industry my expectations are usually very high. I didn't had a chance to stay for a long time but in one night I had an amazing checking experience with an upgrade to a sea view room (9 euros extra) the young good looking girl offered a great check in experience. Since my visit was in Ramadan I asked the security/valet agent for a recommendation to break my fast, he didn't bother to ask a local driver to take me to a special restaurant affordable and offers local food. He simply told me "come inside this car he will take you to a great local place to break your fast" and that was something very…

We definitely didn't regret choosing Hilton for one night stay. Everything was just fine and you feel that you're taken cared of. The located is amazing; you don't just get the beach view but you are literally feets away from the train station and 5 mins away from the city center. We were even gifted a bithday cake when they knew that it was my partner's bithday. The staff are very friendly and cooperative..

This hotel is in walking distance of the train station. (I am SO tired of composing titles and reviews. Everything was fine - if you stay here you'll be happy.) Filler: If Trip Advisor wants me to keep posting voluntary reviews they need to make it easier. At this point I'm only writing if I'm motivated by a good experience, which means that my mediocre experiences and things that are more difficult to write because of ambivalence won't get written.

Nice business hotel - good room. Came across a concept were no drinking water is provided in the room for guests after day one. Every time you need water you have to buy it. Have not come across this anywhere else. It is not a matter of the price, more principle. Believe drinking water is supposed to be offered by default. Apparently not here...!!!

I have stayed in Hilton Garden hotel on may for a night with my friends, clean room, excellent ocean view from the room as well as tangier city view. next day we had breakfast buffet at the restaurant. There was an excellent delicious omlet made by Chef Hamza that day. He made omlet as we requested with amazing seasoning we all had his omlet twice each person. So you can see how delicious the omlet was :-) Honestly if you have chance to go to this hotel, taste chef Hamza's omlet! It was the best one I ever had!!

Very good roomservice, decent price, great beds and showers. Near the mall and a lot of taxis in front of the hotel. Breakfast is good, lots of fruit, great coffee and a lot of options. The Beach is near but not for swimming, boulevard a bit shady. The medina of Tangier is beautiful and very close. Nice people overall.

column3: Tanger Hilton Garden Inn an excellent choice
column4: Great staff, excellent breakfast, attractive and relaxing rooms. The staff went out of their way to make my vacation with my daughter a great time. The breakfast was filling, with many traditional dishes that was fun to try.

column3: Garden Inn hotel with No Garden!
column4: As a new Hilton hotel I expected much better facilities. There is nowhere to sit out and relax with a drink. In warm weather one doesn't want to sit indoor in a small bar. There was no swimming pool and no Spa. We had to go to another hotel in town for this. Whilst the beach was very close by it was very dirty and unappealing. The hotel is ideal for someone who just needs the room and breakfast and doesn't require the facilities usually provided in an international hotel. There is a shopping complex very near for those who like that but in a place like Tangier it is far more interesting to visit the Casbah.

We spent 3 nights at the hotel. It was very nice, clean, organized. The breakfast was very good, good food. The rooms are spacious, we reserved a king bed, very comfortable. I definitely will come back. The location is also very strategic close to the train station.

column3: Brand new, location by the beach, train station, and Tangier mall
column4: Security good, walk to beach, amenities on site, end of block to Tangier Center, brand new mall and large food court. Train station across busy 4 lane road, Mohamed V, from Hotel, coming soon regular Hilton hotel right beside the Mall. Restaurants and Corniche, seawall with walkway, are 1 block from hotel. Suggestion is get beach towels, go to mall, go to food court get lunch to go, take a picnic to beach.

Unable to block sunlight with drapes in the window. Discrepancy with the rate in the reservation and the rate in the hotel computer, it took time to solve the problem when we were exhausted from our trip from Spain.

column3: Handsome New Hotel, Good Location, Outstanding Buffet
column4: We stayed here as part of a group tour, our first night in Morocco. This hotel had apparently just opened a month before our April stay. The service was excellent. We called down for an iron and ironing board and just minutes later they were delivered to our room. It's a beautiful hotel and there's a large mall with grocery store at the end of the block which we enjoyed walking around after dinner and a long day of traveling. It was after 9PM and filled with shopping families. The biggest surprise was the excellent tasting buffet selections at dinner. Delicious!

very well come to us from reception team and they was very corporate with us for any help and we wish them very all the best for future and I will be one of customer of the hotel in every where as bi am now

You spend here few hours, nice shopping and nice area, I like it I thing you should visit here , you can find here very nice parfume , makeup , oud , athletic ware , lady's ware , entertainment , you can spend time with family here I know u will like it.

column3: Nice hotel in a very good location
column4: I stayed at this hotel for 1 night... staff at reception and at breakfast restaurant are really helpful, friendly. Room is nice and clean. Breakfast has so much varieties and restaurant has tables overlooking the sea which I loved. location is great next to it there is Tangier city mall and a lot of restaurants are at walking distance.

I have stayed in the hotel for 3 days. I have really enjoyed my stay. The staff is very professional and they are helping with a big smile. They have also tried to make my stay special specially being a gold memeber... The quality of the breakfast is really great. The rooms are clean and very modern. Some have an excellent and close view on the beach... Special thanks to Tarek, Mehdi... for their special care.

Hotel is very good! Just opened. Good breakfast, very good bed and pillows. Airconditioning works perfect. Comfortable and nice furnished rooms. Service - fast and friendly. Thanks a lot, next trip - will book hotel again.

column3: currently favorite business hotel in Tangiers
column4: I stayed here for business trip and came back for pleasure because we enjoyed it so much. It has the only working business centre in Morocco ! couple of PC/printers and a MAC.. I was able to get all my work done and edit my photos. Such a pleasure. The standards are completely up to USA Hilton standards, all the staff whilst very young and enthusiastic deliver exactly as trained by a Hilton staff team should. Hafsa was delightful and welcomed us back and made us feel very welcome during both stays. The breakfast buffet ... WOOOWW speechless .. Its easily the biggest and best I've had in Morocco. About a 2 minute walk to explore all the dishes, hot, cold, moroccan and european. The rooms are a good size with american style large beds, showers incredible fast wifi and…

Nearby a mall, beach and restaurants, easy to get a taxi, nearby a gare tanger ville, a train station that connected to other important city as Asillah, Rabat, Casablanca, Marakesh and Fes. Menu for breakfast need to be improved as it is the same everyday. It is bored if stay more than 2 days with the same breakfast menu.

Hilton Garden Inn Tanger is brand new opened in March 2016 and so everything feels and smells brand new. Its the first Hilton property in Morocco. Very helpful professional staff. Good wifi, pleasant relaxing ambience throughout the hotel suited to the business traveller more than the leisure market. I would be more than happy to recommend this hotel.

Excellent business oriented hotel, extremely well located, in front of the new railway station of Tangier. Rooms are big, amenities are qualitative, service is improving each time I come with a personnel that is welcoming, impeccably dressed. Hotel is integrated within an overall resort with a shopping center, Tanger City Mall, which includes fooding, leisure and good quality shopping. Would definitely recommend to my network and surely come back for my next business trips.

I had a 4 day business trip in Tangier. I found an excellent deal. Staff are always helpfull and service with a smile. Free Wi-Fi in all areas of the hotel. For sure I go again for my next business trip in Tangier

I have been travelling to Tanger for about 10 years now and finally i have a new favorite hotel. Superb staff, excellent lunch and dinner menus plus the rooms are immaculately clean. This should be everyone's number one hotel choice when in Tanger. Gym is better than most hotels in general plus tbey alsl offer coun operated self laundry machines for long stays. What an added treat!

column3: Very nice and clean hotel,good for BUISNESS,staff very helpful,nice breakfast,lot choice
column4: Bed and bathroom are nice and clean and CONFORTEBLE Nice VIEU quiter,the only things no bath in some rooms only shower,will be nice if I have a bath on my room for my wife But after all it wad nice to stay and we will go back

This Hotel was way more than 5 Star definitely will stay back in this lovely new hilton the manager and the staff was very amazing and this hotel location is near everything near the mall near the ocean near the Old Town I will definitely come back to this hotel

column3: Great hotel in a great City
column4: This is an excellent new hotel, superb location and outstanding staff. The breakfast buffet is second to none. Tangier is a great safe town and it shattered our stereotype the Morroco is full of beggres and pick-pocket. None is true in Tangier. One thing that makes hotel stand out is that the universal utility plug is installed in the wall. So, one need not ask for a converter/transformer in using the American plugs. I did not find this feature in any other hotels we stayed in Europe. Keep up the good work!!!

I stayed here during a business trip to Tangiers. The hotel was selected by the supplier and the hotel agreed to open for us before their official opening on 1/3/16. The rooms were spotless, the gym was well appointed and the staff were keen to help wherever possible. Breakfast was fantastic and the fresh omelettes were cooked to order. Great hotel and I will stay again if I return to Tangiers.

We could not find the hotel as we tried to go into the main, not yet opened Hilton. The workers had no idea how to send us to the Hilton Garden Inn down the road. Then, upon check-in told Breakfast was not included even though my reservation said it was. The room didn't have a sheet on the pull out sofa bed and never arrived even though requested. One elevator didn't work and we just stood around waiting. Not happy.

column3: Totally impressed - fabulous place and amazing staff!
column4: Amazing place very clean and well located next door to McDonalds and kFC as well as Pizza Hut...the best variety of breakfast and the most pleasant Staff...credit to Hafsa at the reception desk who was always smiling and most willing to help. She even helped with directions and places to visit. I would book again...we lost 3 nights here due to the French Public Service Strikes. Beautiful scenery but a lot of development going on which will hopefully be finished in 6 months - hotel is joint to the developing mall and cinema...I can't wait!

It is my first time to stay in this hotel and it was really a memorable stay.the hotel is located in the med town close to the train station and to the city mall.the stuff is friendly and always willing to help.a special thanks to front desk especially to Mr Azour the senior front office supervisor and Mr El mahdi the receptionist.

We had the chance to spend a week end toghether with my little family at this hotel and our experience was enchanting.
